control_attributes.control_description: The organization employs automated mechanisms to help maintain an up-to-date, complete, accurate, and readily available inventory of information system components.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system uniquely identifies and authenticates organizational users (or processes acting on behalf of organizational users).

Control Statement: The organization employs automated mechanisms to help maintain an up-to-date, complete, accurate, and readily available inventory of information system components.
